Test Name: FLCN Full Gene Analysis for Birt-Hogg-Dube Syndrome
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, buccal swab or saliva, or extracted DNA
Purpose: To perform full gene analysis of the FLCN gene for the diagnosis of Birt-Hogg-Dube Syndrome, ensuring accurate detection of pathogenic variants.
Container: EDTA tube (lavender top) for blood; appropriate collection device for buccal swab or saliva
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, capillary electrophoresis sequencer, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, UV transilluminator, centrifuge
